name: Bob Pay Plugin
author: Bob Group

sections.description:
Fast and secure payments

Bob Pay is a simple way for South African merchants to get paid. Use our patented technology to securely receive payments from all major South African banks.

Supported banks currently include: FNB, Nedbank, Absa, Standard Bank, Capitec, Investec, Discovery Bank, TymeBank and Bank Zero.

Patented technology and tools

Add payments to your website with ease using Bob Pay’s developer-friendly tools.
Accept EFT payments in near real time and automatically mark orders as paid for automatic reconciliation.
No more waiting for up to two business days for payments to clear!

Give your buyers a choice of payment methods with no risk of credit card chargebacks.
Bob Pay’s patented technology allows you to securely receive payments in a cost-effective manner without your payers having to compromise terms of use with their bank.
sections.installation:
1. Install the Bob Pay plugin.
  2. Login to your Bob Pay app and create a passphrase, this will be used by the plugin to communicate with Bob Pay.
  3. Within the settings of the plugin, enter the passphrase as well as your account code from Bob Pay.
  4. Ensure your billing details are correct on Bob Pay so the details on the invoices are correct.
  5. Ensure the plugin is enabled.
  6. Ensure development mode is off.

short_description: A WooCommerce plugin that enables you to use Bob Pay as a payment method.
